mapper.select: select count(*) from t_comment where bno = #{bno}
SELECT cno, bno, pcon, comment, commenter, reg_date, up_date FROM t_comment where bno = #{bno} order by reg_date, cno
mapper.delete: delete from t_comment where cno = #{cno} and commenter = #{commenter}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_comment (bno, pcon, comment, commenter, reg_date, up_date) VALUES(#{bno}, #{pcon}, #{comment}, #{commenter}, now(), now())
